text: falamaa ja'at hwla' al'umam almkdhbt rsluha baldlayl alwadhat, farihuu jhla minhum bima eindahum min aleilm almnaqd lamaa ja'at bih alrsl, whll bihim min aleadhab ma kanuu yastaejilun bih rslahm ealaa sabil alskhryt walasthza'. wafi alayat dalil ealaa 'ana kl eilm ynaqd al'islam, 'aw yqdh fyh, 'aw yushakik fi shth, fa'iinah madhmum mmqwt, wmetqdh lays min 'atbae muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
